name: ed8frida
description: Frida script for ED8 (Specifically Reverie) to do various exe modifications.

scripts.build9: frida-compile --tsconfig tsconfig.json src/main.ts -o "D:\Game\Steam\steamapps\common\THE LEGEND OF HEROES KURO NO KISEKI\ed9_crack.js" -c
scripts.watch9: frida-compile --tsconfig tsconfig.json src/main.ts -o "D:\Game\Steam\steamapps\common\THE LEGEND OF HEROES KURO NO KISEKI\ed9_crack.js" -w
